base_description: Pink-capped, faceted bottle with decorative elements.
part_description: The object has a pink cylindrical cap, a faceted white bottle body, and a string of pearl-like beads around the neck. The cap sits centrally on top, while the beads encircle the neck below the cap.
internal_interaction_description: The pink cap fits snugly on the neck of the bottle, likely designed to seal its contents. The pearl-like beads are arranged in a circular pattern around the neck, serving as a decorative element. The faceted design of the bottle provides a stable base and aesthetic appeal.
external_interaction_description: The object can be held and opened by a person, likely for dispensing contents from the bottle. The decorative beads and faceted design make it visually appealing, potentially attracting attention when placed among other items. It may interact with surfaces by standing upright due to its stable base.
